name: Tour de Nebraska

distances.name: 3-Day Tour
distances.description: Multi-day supported gravel tour across Nebraska - approximately 80 miles per day

terrain: Classic Great Plains gravel roads - rolling prairie, farmland, rural roads with long straightaways
weather: Nebraska summer - hot temperatures (80s-90sÂ°F), potential for wind, afternoon thunderstorms possible
uniqueCharacteristics: Small intimate field limited to 250 riders
Fully supported with SAG vehicles and meals
Overnight camping or lodging in small Nebraska towns
Showcases rural Nebraska communities and hospitality
Route changes annually to feature different regions
Great Plains scenery with big sky views
Community dinners and evening social events
